  <script>
   var hpHorizAds = [];
  var hpRailAds = [];
  var hpAllAds = [];

    
  googletag.cmd.push( function() {
    var horizMapping = googletag.sizeMapping()
      .addSize([768, 300], [[1200, 150]])
      .addSize([300, 300], [300, 300])
      .addSize([0, 0], [300, 300])
      .build();

    var railMappingTall = googletag.sizeMapping()
      .addSize([1068, 300], [[300, 600]])
      .addSize([300, 300], [300, 300])
      .addSize([0, 0], [300, 300])
      .build();

    hpHorizAds.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2154169/hp-ad-horz-1', [[1200, 150], [300, 300]], 'div-gpt-ad-1607031140779-0').defineSizeMapping(horizMapping).addService(googletag.pubads()));
    hpHorizAds.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2154169/hp-ad-horz-2', [[1200, 150], [300, 300]], 'div-gpt-ad-1607031685151-0').defineSizeMapping(horizMapping).addService(googletag.pubads()));
    hpRailAds.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2154169/hp-ad-rail-1', [[300, 300], [300, 600]], 'div-gpt-ad-1607032463892-0').defineSizeMapping(railMappingTall).addService(googletag.pubads()));
    hpRailAds.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2154169/hp-ad-rail-2', [[300, 300], [300, 600]], 'div-gpt-ad-1607032595472-0').defineSizeMapping(railMappingTall).addService(googletag.pubads()));
    hpRailAds.push(googletag.defineSlot('/2154169/hp-ad-rail-3', [[300, 300], [300, 600]], 'div-gpt-ad-1607032718644-0').defineSizeMapping(railMappingTall).addService(googletag.pubads()));

    // After body slot is rendered, determine if it is empty and
    // add a class to the parent to hide its styles.
    // Check for ad_is_sponored target and show sponsor note if so
    googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', function(event) {
      var slot = event.slot;
      var slotEl = document.querySelector('#'+slot.getSlotElementId());

      if (slotEl) {
        var showSponsorNote = slot.getTargeting('ad_is_sponsored')[0]  === 'true' ? true : false;
        var slotParent = slotEl.parentElement;

        if (showSponsorNote) {
          var figcaptionEl = slotParent.querySelector('.ad-sponsor-note');
          figcaptionEl.classList.add('is-visible');
        }

        // Add class to empty adds so we can remove styles
        if (event.isEmpty) {
          slotParent.classList.add('is-empty');
        } else {
          slotParent.classList.remove('is-empty');
        }
      }
    });

    // Collapse divs if there is nothing to load
    googletag.pubads().collapseEmptyDivs();
    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.pubads().enableLazyLoad();
    googletag.enableServices();
  });
  </script>

          </span>

           <path d="M137 98.5C133 98.5 132 97.5 132 92.5V50.2C133.579 49.0591 135.454 48.3993 137.4 48.3C140.5 48.3 143.2 49.6 147.5 54.7C148.8 56.3 150 57 151.3 57C153.3 57 154.5 55.7 154.5 53.4V38H151.5C147.812 37.9397 144.155 38.6872 140.786 40.1901C137.418 41.6931 134.419 43.915 132 46.7V38H108V41.5H112C116 41.5 117 42.5 117 47.5V92.5C117 97.5 116 98.5 112 98.5H108V102H145V98.5H137ZM158.5 41.5H161.2C165.2 41.5 166.2 42.5 166.2 47.5V92.5C166.2 97.5 165.2 98.5 161.2 98.5H156.8V102H189.9V98.5H186.2C182.2 98.5 181.2 97.5 181.2 92.5V38H158.5V41.5ZM195.4 102H199.1V101C199.1 98.7 200.8 98.8 202.8 99.5C210.5 102.2 214.4 103 220.5 103C236.8 103 244.5 95.4 244.5 82.7C244.5 74.2 239.6 66.7 227.3 63.1L211.2 58.4C203.5 56.1 201.2 53 201.2 49.7C201.2 46.4 204.2 43.4 209.1 43.4C216.6 43.4 223.8 48 234.3 56.3C235.151 57.0952 236.241 57.5873 237.4 57.7C239.4 57.7 240.6 56.4 240.6 54.1V38H236.9V39C236.9 40.7 235.8 41.5 233.7 40.7C226.3 37.9 221.8 37 217.6 37C203.1 37 196 45.2 196 56.9C196 65.3 201.8 72.4 215.2 76.5L229.6 80.9C236.8 83.1 239.3 86 239.3 89.9C239.3 93.8 236 96.6 231.1 96.6C224.3 96.6 215.3 93.2 202.1 83C201.131 82.094 199.911 81.5015 198.6 81.3C196.6 81.3 195.4 82.6 195.4 84.9V102ZM257.8 83.9C257.8 96.3 265.1 103 278.7 103C285.1 103 294.8 101.2 302.3 98.7V87C302.3 84.7 301.1 83.4 299.1 83.4C297.9 83.4 296.8 84.1 295.6 85.9C288.4 96.7 282.8 99.6 278.2 99.6C274.2 99.6 272.8 97.8 272.8 92.7V49.5H304.7V38H272.8V14H269.1V14.7C269.1 29 260.3 40.4 247.8 42.8V49.5H257.8V83.9ZM166.2 30H181.2V12.5H166.2V30ZM84.9 64V88.3C79.1 91.9 72.6 94 67.1 94C39.7 94 15.1 64.1 15.1 33C15.1 18.4 24.7 6.9 41.4 6.9C51.9 6.9 72.3 13.6 87.4 29.8C87.8588 30.38 88.4339 30.8576 89.0884 31.2021C89.7428 31.5465 90.4621 31.7502 91.2 31.8C93.2 31.8 94.4 30.5 94.4 28.2V2H90.7V3C90.7 6.6 88.6 7.6 83.4 6C72.9626 2.50408 62.0057 0.813193 51 1C18.1 1 0 26.8 0 52C0 80.8 21.9 103 51 103C63.148 102.914 74.9783 99.11 84.9 92.1V102H99.4V50H46.4V64H84.9Z" fill="currentColor">
           </path>
          </svg>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </header>
      <nav class="topic-nav">
       <div class="topic-nav__inner">
        <div class="topic-nav__content">
         <span class="topic-nav__date">
          Sunday, March 21st
         </span>

   <div class="page__inner">
    <main class="" id="content" tabindex="-1">
     <div class="homepage">
      <section class="hp-topper left-feature hp-topper--art-horizontal">
       <div class="hp-topper__main">
        <div class="hp-topper__cover-story">
         <article class="hp-cover-story">
          <div class="hp-cover-story__body">
           <h3 class="hp-cover-story__title js-cursor-target">
            <a class="hp-cover-story__link" href="https://grist.org/article/i-have-a-covid-19-vaccine-appointment-do-i-deserve-it/">
             I have a COVID-19 vaccine appointment. Do I deserve it?
            </a>
           </h3>
           <div class="hp-cover-story__excerpt hp-cover-story__excerpt--shortform">
            <p>
             Its baffling that vaccine rollouts have left polluted communities behind. What can I do?
            </p>
           </div>
           <div class="hp-cover-story__contributor-info">
            <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
             <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
              <a href="https://grist.org/author/eve-andrews/">
               <figure aria-label="Eve Andrews Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Eve4.jpeg" role="img">
               </figure>
              </a>
             </figure>
             <span class="contributor-info__text">
              <span class="contributor-info__name">
               <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/eve-andrews/">
                Eve Andrews
               </a>
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="hp-cover-story__art">
            <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/article/i-have-a-covid-19-vaccine-appointment-do-i-deserve-it/" tabindex="-1">
             <figure class="tease-art__figure">
              <img alt="Illustration of a house with a picket fence made of syringes and smog clouds hovering above" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden" src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Umbra_vaccines-v2.jpg?w=1200"/>
             </figure>
            </a>
           </div>
           <div>
           </div>
           <div class="hp-topper__subscription">
            <div class="hp-topper-newsletter">
             <h2 class="subsection-header">
              The Beacon
              <span>
               Your Daily Good News
              </span>
             </h2>
             <div class="hp-topper-newsletter__content">
              <figure class="hp-topper-newsletter__logo">
               <div class="beacon-logo beacon-logo--thumbnail">
               </div>
              </figure>
              <div class="hp-topper-newsletter__text">
               <p>
                The U.K. government revealed plans this week to cut the amount of carbon dioxide spewed by industrial sites and public buildings by two-thirds within the next 15 years.
               </p>
              </div>
              <a class="hp-topper-newsletter__cta button" href="https://go.grist.org/signup/beacon">
               <svg class="svg-newsletter">
                <use xlink:href="#newsletter">
                </use>
               </svg>
               Subscribe
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

                 He wanted to get his home off fossil fuels. There was just one problem.
                </a>
               </h3>
               <div class="tease-meta">
                <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">

          <div class="section-header">
           <div class="section-header__content">
            <div class="section-header__title">
             <h2 class="section-header__title-text">
              Recent
             </h2>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <section class="tease-section">
           <div class="tease-section__content">
            <div class="tease-section__list">
             <ul class="tease-list">
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/politics/the-army-of-environmental-super-voters-is-growing-and-marching-on-city-hall/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/election-workers-e1616191751927.jpg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/politics/the-army-of-environmental-super-voters-is-growing-and-marching-on-city-hall/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/election-workers-e1616191751927.jpg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/politics/the-army-of-environmental-super-voters-is-growing-and-marching-on-city-hall/">
                   The army of environmental super voters is growing, and marching on city hall
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  The Environmental Voter Project, which has contacted nearly 6.2 million voters since 2015, is expanding into five new states.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/alexander-c-kaufman/">
                      Alexander C. Kaufman
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/politics/">
                      Politics
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/extreme-weather/marshall-shepherd-meteorologist-university-of-georgia/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Marshall_Shepherd.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/extreme-weather/marshall-shepherd-meteorologist-university-of-georgia/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Marshall_Shepherd.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/extreme-weather/marshall-shepherd-meteorologist-university-of-georgia/">
                   Meteorologist, climate expert, zombie slayer: a Q&amp;A with J. Marshall Shepherd
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Im hopeful that there will be a conversation about solutions.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/zoya-teirstein/">
                     <figure aria-label="Zoya Teirstein Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/IMG_8931-e1614192034999.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/zoya-teirstein/">
                      Zoya Teirstein
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/extreme-weather/">
                      Extreme Weather
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/equity/democrats-congress-environmental-justice-tammy-duckworth/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/duckworth.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/equity/democrats-congress-environmental-justice-tammy-duckworth/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/duckworth.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/equity/democrats-congress-environmental-justice-tammy-duckworth/">
                   A groundbreaking environmental justice bill is poised to become law
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Democrats who drafted the Environmental Justice for All Act are optimistic it will pass.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/yvette-cabrera/">
                     <figure aria-label="Yvette Cabrera Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/YvetteCabrera_20201212_02_daa-1-e1615925746559.jpg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/yvette-cabrera/">
                      Yvette Cabrera
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/equity/">
                      Equity
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/oil/these-groups-want-the-government-to-crack-down-on-greenwashing/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/chevron-greenwashing.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/oil/these-groups-want-the-government-to-crack-down-on-greenwashing/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/chevron-greenwashing.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/oil/these-groups-want-the-government-to-crack-down-on-greenwashing/">
                   These groups want the government to crack down on greenwashing
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  A complaint filed against Chevron for deceptive advertising could mark a new strategy for fossil fuel opponents.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/ysabellekempe/">
                      Ysabelle Kempe
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/climate-energy/oil/">
                      Oil
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
             </ul>
            </div>
            <aside class="tease-section__ads">
             <div class="ad-rail">
              <figure class="ad-rail__ad-placement ad-rail__ad-placement--sticky is-empty">
               <div id="div-gpt-ad-1607032463892-0" style="max-width: 300px;">
                <script>
                 googletag.cmd.push(function() {
              googletag.display("div-gpt-ad-1607032463892-0");
            });
                </script>
               </div>
               <figcaption class="ad-sponsor-note">
                <p>
                 Grist thanks its sponsors.
                 <a href="https://grist.org/advertising/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                  Become one
                 </a>

                </p>
               </figcaption>
              </figure>
             </div>
            </aside>
           </div>
          </section>
          <div class="section-header">
           <div class="section-header__content">
            <div class="section-header__title">
             <h2 class="section-header__title-text">
              Topics
             </h2>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="topic-positioning">
           <h3 class="topic-positioning__statement">
            Grist reports on topics like
            <a class="topic-positioning__topic" href="/politics/">
             Politics
            </a>
            ,
            <a class="topic-positioning__topic" href="/equity/">
             Equity
            </a>
            ,
            <a class="topic-positioning__topic" href="/energy/">
             Energy
            </a>
            ,
            <a class="topic-positioning__topic" href="/culture/">
             Culture
            </a>
            ,
        and how they intersect with climate.
            <a class="topic-positioning__topic" href="https://grist.org/all-topics">
             All topics.
            </a>
           </h3>
          </div>
          <section class="side-by-side-collections">
           <div class="side-by-side-collection">
            <div class="side-by-side-collection__header">
             <h2 class="subsection-header">
              Ask Umbra
             </h2>
            </div>
            <div class="side-by-side-collection__content">

              <article class="small-tease">

                </figure>
               </a>

          <div class="section-header">
           <div class="section-header__content">
            <div class="section-header__title">
             <h2 class="section-header__title-text">
              Climate + Data
             </h2>
             <span class="section-header__title-link">
              <a href="https://grist.org/donald-trump-environmental-and-climate-rollbacks/">
               View
              </a>
              <span>
               
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <section class="collection">
           <div class="collection__feature">
            <div class="large-tease">
             <div class="large-tease__art-wrapper">
              <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/politics/the-art-of-repeal/" tabindex="-1">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                <img alt="Donald Trump Joe Biden environmental legacy" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/art-of-repeal.jpg?w=1200"/>
               </figure>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="large-tease__content">
              <div class="large-tease-text">
               <h3 class="large-tease-text__title js-cursor-target">
                <a class="large-tease-text__link" href="https://grist.org/politics/the-art-of-repeal/">
                 The art of repeal: illustrating Trumps toxic legacy  and Bidens daunting task ahead
                </a>
               </h3>
               <div class="large-tease-text__contributor-info">
                <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                 <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                  <a href="https://grist.org/author/clayton-aldern/">
                   <figure aria-label="Clayton Aldern Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Clay.jpeg" role="img">
                   </figure>
                  </a>
                 </figure>
                 <span class="contributor-info__text">
                  <span class="contributor-info__name">

               <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                <img alt="Black and white photograph of an ice covered, closed highway in Houston, Texas." class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/texas-highway.jpg?w=1024"/>
               </figure>
              </a>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">

                The crisis in Texas underscores the deadly risks when the grid goes down
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                 <a href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                  <figure aria-label="Emily Pontecorvo Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/emily-pontecorvo.jpeg" role="img">
                  </figure>
                 </a>
                </figure>
                <span class="contributor-info__text">
                 <span class="contributor-info__name">
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                   Emily Pontecorvo
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </article>
            </li>
            <li class="collection__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/energy/abandoned-oil-wells-texas-railroad-commission/" tabindex="-1">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                <img alt="A photograph of rusty abandoned oil pumps in rural Texas." class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/tx-rural-oil.jpg?w=1024"/>
               </figure>
              </a>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">
               <a class="small-tease__link" href="https://grist.org/energy/abandoned-oil-wells-texas-railroad-commission/">
                Dying oil companies parting gift: millions in cleanup costs
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                 <a href="https://grist.org/author/naveena-sadasivam/">
                  <figure aria-label="Naveena Sadasivam Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/DSC02241-e1614201984838.jpeg" role="img">
                  </figure>
                 </a>
                </figure>
                <span class="contributor-info__text">
                 <span class="contributor-info__name">
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/naveena-sadasivam/">
                   Naveena Sadasivam
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </article>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </section>
          <div class="section-header">
           <div class="section-header__content">
            <div class="section-header__title">
             <h2 class="section-header__title-text">
              Fix
              <span>
               Grist Solutions Lab
              </span>
             </h2>
             <span class="section-header__title-link">
              <a href="/Fix">
               View
              </a>
              <span>
               
              </span>
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <section class="fix">
           <ul class="fix__tease-column">
            <li class="fix__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/fix/cecil-corbin-mark-legacy-we-act-environmental-justice/" tabindex="-1">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                <img alt="Cecil Corbin-Mark" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Cecil_Corbin-Mark-e1614897420401.jpg?w=1024"/>
               </figure>
              </a>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">

                </span>

               </figure>

           </div>

          <section class="tease-section">
           <div class="tease-section__content">
            <div class="tease-section__list">
             <ul class="tease-list">
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/politics/biden-revives-epa-climate-change-site-trump-deleted/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="The EPA logo with a hand shaped cursor on top of it" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/epa-website.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/politics/biden-revives-epa-climate-change-site-trump-deleted/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="The EPA logo with a hand shaped cursor on top of it" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/epa-website.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/politics/biden-revives-epa-climate-change-site-trump-deleted/">
                   Facts are back, and so is the EPAs climate change website
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Trump erased it. Biden revived it.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/kate-yoder/">
                     <figure aria-label="Kate Yoder Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/IMG_20210103_140613-e1614190961674.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/kate-yoder/">
                      Kate Yoder
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/politics/">
                      Politics
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/transportation/stacey-abrams-on-voting-rights-climate-transportation/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Stacey_Abrams.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/transportation/stacey-abrams-on-voting-rights-climate-transportation/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Stacey_Abrams.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/transportation/stacey-abrams-on-voting-rights-climate-transportation/">
                   Stacey Abrams helped Georgia go blue. Now she wants it to go green.
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Abrams connects the dots between voting rights, transit, and the future of the planet.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                     <figure aria-label="Emily Pontecorvo Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/emily-pontecorvo.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                      Emily Pontecorvo
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/cities/transportation/">
                      Transportation
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/buildings/he-wanted-to-get-his-home-off-fossil-fuels-there-was-just-one-problem/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="Interior of a house with lightning bolts on appliances" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/electric-house.jpg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/buildings/he-wanted-to-get-his-home-off-fossil-fuels-there-was-just-one-problem/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="Interior of a house with lightning bolts on appliances" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/electric-house.jpg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/buildings/he-wanted-to-get-his-home-off-fossil-fuels-there-was-just-one-problem/">
                   He wanted to get his home off fossil fuels. There was just one problem.
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Want to electrify your home? Good luck finding a contractor.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                     <figure aria-label="Emily Pontecorvo Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/emily-pontecorvo.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                      Emily Pontecorvo
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/buildings/">
                      Buildings
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/article/i-have-a-covid-19-vaccine-appointment-do-i-deserve-it/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="Illustration of a house with a picket fence made of syringes and smog clouds hovering above" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Umbra_vaccines-v2.jpg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/article/i-have-a-covid-19-vaccine-appointment-do-i-deserve-it/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="Illustration of a house with a picket fence made of syringes and smog clouds hovering above" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Umbra_vaccines-v2.jpg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/article/i-have-a-covid-19-vaccine-appointment-do-i-deserve-it/">
                   I have a COVID-19 vaccine appointment. Do I deserve it?
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Its baffling that vaccine rollouts have left polluted communities behind. What can I do?
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/eve-andrews/">
                     <figure aria-label="Eve Andrews Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Eve4.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/eve-andrews/">
                      Eve Andrews
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/article/">
                      Uncategorized
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
             </ul>

             <h2 class="section-header__title-text">
              Watch This
             </h2>
            </div>

          <section class="collection">
           <div class="collection__feature">
            <div class="large-tease">
             <div class="large-tease__art-wrapper">
              <div class="tease-art tease-art--video">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure tease-art--video">
                <button aria-label="Play video" class="play-button js-play-button" data-post-title="Biden rejoining the Paris Agreement, explained" data-post-url="https://grist.org/politics/biden-rejoining-the-paris-agreement-explained-climate/" data-video-id="MQQdzELKzV0" data-video-type="youtube">
                 <svg viewbox="0 0 17 17">
                  <circle cx="8.5" cy="8.5" r="8.5">
                  </circle>
                  <path d="M6.67383 5.29883L11.7012 8.5L6.67383 11.7012V5.29883Z">
                  </path>
                 </svg>

                 3 min
                </figcaption>

               </figure>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="large-tease__content">
              <div class="large-tease-text">
               <h3 class="large-tease-text__title js-cursor-target">
                <a class="large-tease-text__link" href="https://grist.org/politics/biden-rejoining-the-paris-agreement-explained-climate/">
                 Biden rejoining the Paris Agreement, explained
                </a>
               </h3>
               <div class="large-tease-text__contributor-info">
                <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                 <span class="contributor-info__text">
                  <span class="contributor-info__name">
                   <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/jesse-nichols/">
                    Jesse Nichols
                   </a>
                   &amp;
                   <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/shannon-osaka/">
                    Shannon Osaka
                   </a>
                  </span>
                  <span class="contributor-info__more">
                   <a href="/climate-energy/">
                    Climate &amp; Energy
                   </a>
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>

            <li class="collection__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <div class="tease-art tease-art--video">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure tease-art--video">
                <button aria-label="Play video" class="play-button js-play-button" data-post-title="How 100% clean energy could power our cities and towns" data-post-url="https://grist.org/energy/how-100-clean-energy-could-power-our-cities-and-towns/" data-video-id="i_xwYTKX8pY" data-video-type="youtube">
                 <svg viewbox="0 0 17 17">
                  <circle cx="8.5" cy="8.5" r="8.5">
                  </circle>
                  <path d="M6.67383 5.29883L11.7012 8.5L6.67383 11.7012V5.29883Z">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </button>
                <figcaption class="tease-art__video-duration">
                 6 min
                </figcaption>
                <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/thumbnail-decarbonation6.jpg?w=1024"/>
               </figure>
              </div>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">
               <a class="small-tease__link" href="https://grist.org/energy/how-100-clean-energy-could-power-our-cities-and-towns/">
                How 100% clean energy could power our cities and towns
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                 <a href="https://grist.org/author/daniel-penner/">
                  <figure aria-label="Daniel Penner Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/daniel_profile-e1614202291583.jpeg" role="img">
                  </figure>
                 </a>
                </figure>
                <span class="contributor-info__text">
                 <span class="contributor-info__name">
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/daniel-penner/">
                   Daniel Penner
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </article>
            </li>
            <li class="collection__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <div class="tease-art tease-art--video">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure tease-art--video">
                <button aria-label="Play video" class="play-button js-play-button" data-post-title="1,000 years of fake meat in 2 minutes" data-post-url="https://grist.org/food/1000-years-of-fake-meat-in-two-minutes/" data-video-id="bR2lpc0cD7E" data-video-type="youtube">
                 <svg viewbox="0 0 17 17">
                  <circle cx="8.5" cy="8.5" r="8.5">
                  </circle>
                  <path d="M6.67383 5.29883L11.7012 8.5L6.67383 11.7012V5.29883Z">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </button>
                <figcaption class="tease-art__video-duration">
                 2 min
                </figcaption>
                <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/meat_alt_wp.jpg?w=1024"/>
               </figure>
              </div>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">
               <a class="small-tease__link" href="https://grist.org/food/1000-years-of-fake-meat-in-two-minutes/">
                1,000 years of fake meat in 2 minutes
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                <span class="contributor-info__text">
                 <span class="contributor-info__name">
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/daniel-penner/">
                   Daniel Penner
                  </a>
                  &amp;
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/jesse-nichols/">
                   Jesse Nichols
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </article>
            </li>
            <li class="collection__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <div class="tease-art tease-art--video">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure tease-art--video">
                <button aria-label="Play video" class="play-button js-play-button" data-post-title="Companies say they are going net-zero. Can we trust them?" data-post-url="https://grist.org/energy/companies-say-they-are-going-net-zero-can-we-trust-them/" data-video-id="DrHugcX4o0I" data-video-type="youtube">
                 <svg viewbox="0 0 17 17">
                  <circle cx="8.5" cy="8.5" r="8.5">
                  </circle>
                  <path d="M6.67383 5.29883L11.7012 8.5L6.67383 11.7012V5.29883Z">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </button>
                <figcaption class="tease-art__video-duration">
                 4 min
                </figcaption>
                <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/thumbnail_net_zero_site.jpg?w=1024"/>
               </figure>
              </div>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">
               <a class="small-tease__link" href="https://grist.org/energy/companies-say-they-are-going-net-zero-can-we-trust-them/">
                Companies say they are going net-zero. Can we trust them?
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                <span class="contributor-info__text">
                 <span class="contributor-info__name">
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/emily-pontecorvo/">
                   Emily Pontecorvo
                  </a>
                  &amp;
                  <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/jesse-nichols/">
                   Jesse Nichols
                  </a>
                 </span>
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </article>
            </li>
            <li class="collection__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <div class="tease-art tease-art--video">

              </div>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">
               <a class="small-tease__link" href="https://grist.org/climate/how-did-we-get-here-four-years-of-climate-change-in-eight-minutes/">
                How did we get here? Four years of climate change in eight minutes
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                 <a href="https://grist.org/author/daniel-penner/">

            </li>
            <li class="collection__tease">
             <article class="small-tease">
              <div class="tease-art tease-art--video">
               <figure class="tease-art__figure tease-art--video">
                <button aria-label="Play video" class="play-button js-play-button" data-post-title="A 1930s city planning rule has drivers setting their own speed limits" data-post-url="https://grist.org/energy/a-1930s-city-planning-rule-has-drivers-setting-their-own-speed-limits/" data-video-id="ado6uLHvo9U" data-video-type="youtube">

              </div>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">
               <a class="small-tease__link" href="https://grist.org/energy/a-1930s-city-planning-rule-has-drivers-setting-their-own-speed-limits/">
                A 1930s city planning rule has drivers setting their own speed limits
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">

                 <a href="https://grist.org/author/jesse-nichols/">

               </figure>
              </div>
              <h3 class="small-tease__title js-cursor-target">

                How COVID-19 is a threat to the premise of public transit
               </a>
              </h3>
              <div class="tease-meta">
               <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">

          <section class="tease-section">
           <div class="tease-section__content">
            <div class="tease-section__list">
             <ul class="tease-list">
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/culture/new-climate-power-commercial-badass/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/calling-all-builders2.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/culture/new-climate-power-commercial-badass/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/calling-all-builders2.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/culture/new-climate-power-commercial-badass/">
                   The new symbol of climate action: Hard hats?
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Polar bears, recycling bins, and trees are out.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/kate-yoder/">
                     <figure aria-label="Kate Yoder Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/IMG_20210103_140613-e1614190961674.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/kate-yoder/">
                      Kate Yoder
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/culture/">
                      Culture
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/animals/seaweed-a-planet-saving-anti-burping-drug-for-cows/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="A black and white cow on top of a photo of red seaweed" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/seaweed-cow-1.jpeg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/animals/seaweed-a-planet-saving-anti-burping-drug-for-cows/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="A black and white cow on top of a photo of red seaweed" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/seaweed-cow-1.jpeg?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/animals/seaweed-a-planet-saving-anti-burping-drug-for-cows/">
                   Seaweed: A planet-saving, anti-burping drug for cows
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  New study: Sprinkling red seaweed in cattle feed slashes methane burps.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/nathanael-johnson/">
                     <figure aria-label="Nathanael Johnson Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/IMG_1266-e1614196656458.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/nathanael-johnson/">
                      Nathanael Johnson
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/animals/">
                      Animals
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/article/new-look-recommitting-to-climate-justice-solutions/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="Grist logo on a celery background" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Grist-rebrand-logo-announcement.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/article/new-look-recommitting-to-climate-justice-solutions/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="Grist logo on a celery background" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Grist-rebrand-logo-announcement.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/article/new-look-recommitting-to-climate-justice-solutions/">
                   With a new look, Grist recommits to climate, justice, and solutions
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  Weve grown and expanded our work  now that's reflected in our new look and new tagline: Climate. Justice. Solutions.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/brady-pinero-walkinshaw/">
                     <figure aria-label="Brady Piero Walkinshaw Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Brady-1.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/brady-pinero-walkinshaw/">
                      Brady Piero Walkinshaw
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/article/">
                      Uncategorized
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
              <li class="tease">
               <div class="tease__inner">
                <div class="tease__art-wrapper">
                 <div class="tease__art-crop tease__art-crop--square">
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--desktop">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/culture/jane-fondas-greatest-role-climate-activist/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Jane_Fonda-transparent.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="tease__art tease__art--mobile">
                   <a class="tease-art tease-art--image" href="https://grist.org/culture/jane-fondas-greatest-role-climate-activist/" tabindex="-1">
                    <figure class="tease-art__figure">
                     <img alt="" class="tease-art__art js-modal-gallery__hidden lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Jane_Fonda-transparent.png?w=1024"/>
                    </figure>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tease__content">
                 <h3 class="tease__title js-cursor-target">
                  <a class="tease__link" href="https://grist.org/culture/jane-fondas-greatest-role-climate-activist/">
                   The ageless and arresting activism of Jane Fonda
                  </a>
                 </h3>
                 <p class="tease__desc">
                  The outspoken actress's entire career has been building to the fight for our future.
                 </p>
                 <div class="tease__contributor">
                  <div class="contributor-info contributor-info--in-tease">
                   <figure class="contributor-info__headshot">
                    <a href="https://grist.org/author/eve-andrews/">
                     <figure aria-label="Eve Andrews Headshot" class="headshot lazyload" data-bg="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Eve4.jpeg" role="img">
                     </figure>
                    </a>
                   </figure>
                   <span class="contributor-info__text">
                    <span class="contributor-info__name">
                     <a class="byline-link" href="https://grist.org/author/eve-andrews/">
                      Eve Andrews
                     </a>
                    </span>
                    <span class="contributor-info__more">
                     <a href="/culture/">
                      Culture
                     </a>
                    </span>
                   </span>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </li>
             </ul>
            </div>

          </section>
          <div class="section-header">
           <div class="section-header__content">
            <div class="section-header__title">
             <h2 class="section-header__title-text">
              Subscribe
             </h2>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <section class="subscriptions">
           <div class="subscription">
            <div class="subscription__art-wrapper">
             <figure class="subscription__art">
              <svg class="subscription__icon subscription__icon--light svg-newsletter">
               <use xlink:href="#newsletter">
               </use>
              </svg>
              <div class="beacon-logo beacon-logo--full">
              </div>
             </figure>
            </div>
            <div class="subscription__content">
             <h2 class="subsection-header">
              The Beacon
             </h2>
             <p>
              Need a daily dose of good climate news? Subscribe to The Beacon to receive daily updates from Grist on solutions driving us forward. Always free, and always fresh.
             </p>
             <a class="subscription__cta button" href="https://go.grist.org/signup/beacon?utm_campaign=signup-page&amp;utm_medium=web&amp;utm_source=grist&amp;utm_content=beacon">
              Subscribe
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="subscription">
            <div class="subscription__art-wrapper">
             <figure class="subscription__art">
              <svg class="subscription__icon subscription__icon--dark svg-podcast">
               <use xlink:href="#podcast">
               </use>
              </svg>
              <img alt="" class="lazyload" data-src="https://grist.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/TempCheck.png"/>
             </figure>
            </div>
            <div class="subscription__content">
             <h2 class="subsection-header">
              Temperature Check
             </h2>
             <p>
              In the last episode of Temperature Check before the new year, host Andrew Simon and returning co-host Justin Worland look back on the biggest climate stories of 2020 and look ahead to whats in store for the holiday season.
             </p>
             <a class="subscription__cta button" href="https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/temperature-check/id1537196123">
              Subscribe
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </section>
         </article>
        </div>

         <div class="footer__cta-wrapper">

            Your support helps Grist reveal the under-reported connection between social justice and climate change.
           </p>

             Join Us
            </span>

            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/team/">
              Team
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/contact/">
              Contact
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/careers/">
              Careers
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/fellowships/">
              Fellowships
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/pressroom/">
              Pressroom
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
          <div class="footer__nav">
           <h2 class="subsection-header">
            More
           </h2>
           <ul class="footer__nav-list">
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="http://grist.org/fix">
              Fix
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/events/">
              Events
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="https://grist.org/visionaries/">
              Visionaries Bureau
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="footer__nav-item">
             <a class="footer__nav-link" href="http://grist.org/membership">
              Become a Member
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </div>
          <div class="footer__commitment">
           <div class="footer__commitment-title">
            <h2 class="subsection-header">
             Sustainability
            </h2>
           </div>
           <div class="footer__commitment-text">
            <p>
             <span style="font-weight: 400">
              As part of our commitment to sustainability, in 2021 Grist moved its office headquarters to the Bullitt Center in Seattles vibrant Capitol Hill neighborhood. Known as one of the greenest commercial buildings in the world, since it opened its doors on Earth Day in 2013 the Bullitt Center has been setting a new standard for sustainable design.
             </span>
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

      piAId = '400522';
	piCId = '3017';

	(function() {
		function async_load(){
			var s = document.createElement('script'); s.type = 'text/javascript';
			s.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://pi' : 'http://cdn') + '.pardot.com/pd.js';

		}
		if(window.attachEvent) { window.attachEvent('onload', async_load); }
		else { window.addEventListener('load', async_load, false); }
	})();
     </script>

      (function(W,i,s,e,P,o,p) {
	W['WisePopsObject'] = P;

		(W[P].q = W[P].q||[]).push(arguments)
	}, W[P].l = 1*new Date();
